CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL( Accountname__r.Name ), "" , Accountname__r.Name +', ') & IF( Active__c =FALSE, "" , "Active" +', ') & IF( ISNULL( POL__r.Name ), "" , POL__r.Name +', ') & IF( ISNULL( POD__r.Name ), "" , POD__r.Name +', ') & IF( ISNULL( Validstartdate__c ), "" , TEXT(Validstartdate__c) +', ') & IF( ISNULL( Validenddate__c ), "" ,TEXT( Validenddate__c) +', ')
CustomField.label: Check Validate
